scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long white beard and a distinctive turban is depicted. He is gesturing with his right hand, pointing upwards with his index finger, and with his left hand, he is pointing at an open book laid before him. The book contains musical notation. The figure is richly dressed in a green tunic over a red garment with gold trim. The scene is framed within a circular medallion with a gold background and decorative elements on the right side.
